entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
